title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.15 - Admission charge as a requisite to participate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.15 - Admission charge as a requisite to participate

State Regulations

No person who has not paid the required admission charge
shall be allowed to participate as a player in any game or games of
chance. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
